name: Maintain (rafatic)
description:
Maintain is a factory managing game.

You are put in charge of a factory. Your goal : maintain the loop of product.

But beware, your employees are easily distractible. Make sure to make their work as mundane as possible and keep them away from any weird looking products.

Disclaimer : this game is highly unfinished. Gameplay is not implemented entirely and there is no proper GameOver.
